job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement and maintain reliable, scalable and backend services for DeepL Write
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software engineering activities focused on building and maintaining backend services, emphasizing reliability and scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: Closely collaborate with our Research teams to bring the new functionality of their models to our end users via new features and integrations
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI model functionality into end-user features and applications, which is a core aspect of software development in an AI context.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to monitoring and debugging the services in production, e.g. by defining expressive metrics and ensuring expressive logs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the operational aspects of managing services in production, including monitoring and debugging, which aligns with MLOps principles for deployed systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate across teams to define shared interfaces and ensure smooth operation in production
job_tasks.justification: This involves defining technical interfaces and ensuring the operational smoothness of systems, which are key software development tasks.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on backend service development, integration, and operations using C#. While the company's product (DeepL Write) is AI-powered, the role's responsibilities are centered on building and maintaining the software infrastructure that supports AI functionality, rather than developing or fine-tuning AI models themselves. There is no mention of tasks related to Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization).

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly defines the role as a backend engineer with a focus on C# and service development. It mentions collaboration with research teams for AI functionality integration, which is typical for an AI-adjacent role. The absence of specific AI/ML model development tasks or frameworks in the core responsibilities makes the profile assignment straightforward. The clarity on the technical stack (C#) and the nature of the tasks (backend services) supports a high confidence score.
